DOC.brief_title: Home-based Health Management Chronic Obstructive Lung Disease ( COPD ) Patients
DOC.detailed_description: This study consist home-based pulmonary rehabilitation system . The system consist tablet computer , pulse oximeter , activity monitor weekly telephone health coach call . The rehabilitation period last 8 week . This randomized trial two group . Group A complete study activity first 8 week study follow period observation . Group B complete 8 week observation follow 8 week rehabilitation .
DOC.criteria: • Men woman age 40 year old Current former smoker least 10 packyears Diagnosis Global Initiative Chronic Lung Disease ( GOLD ) stage II , III IV COPD document pulmonary function Are eligible Pulmonary Rehabilitation • Unable perform mild exercise Patients high likelihood lose followup contact ( patient active chemical dependency ) , plan move state , live healthcare area . Patients inability provide good data follow command ( patient disorient , severe neurologic psychiatric condition ) .
